org.pac4j.oauth.client

Class Google2Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.util.InitializableObject
      • org.pac4j.core.client.BaseClient<OAuthCredentials,U>
        • org.pac4j.oauth.client.BaseOAuthClient<U>
          • org.pac4j.oauth.client.BaseOAuth20Client<Google2Profile>
            • org.pac4j.oauth.client.Google2Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Client<OAuthCredentials,Google2Profile>

    public class Google2Client
extends BaseOAuth20Client<Google2Profile>
    This class is the OAuth client to authenticate users in Google using OAuth protocol version 2.0.

    The scope is by default : Google2Client.Google2Scope.EMAIL, but it can also but set to : Google2Client.Google2Scope.PROFILE or Google2Client.Google2Scope.EMAIL_AND_PROFILE.

    It returns a Google2Profile.

    More information at https://developers.google.com/accounts/docs/OAuth2Login

    Since:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
    See Also:
    Google2Profile
